MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH46 postcode area of West Linton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:07am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:37am on  Friday, 19 February 2021
